snippet: Green Day said it was back in the studio in its hometown of Oakland, Calif., to record three new albums: "¡Uno!," scheduled for release on Sept. 25; "¡Dos!," on Nov. 13; and - wait for it - "¡Tré!" on Jan. 15 of next year.
abstract: Green Day said it was back in the studio in its hometown of Oakland, Calif., to record three new albums: "¡Uno!," scheduled for release on Sept. 25; "¡Dos!," on Nov. 13; and - wait for it - "¡Tré!" on Jan. 15 of next year.

headline.main: Triple Trouble: Green Day to Release Three New Albums Over Four Months
headline.print_headline: Green Day to Release 3 Albums in 4 Months
